short_description: Evaluate the text classification SQL/MR function
long_description: Evaluate the text classification SQL/MR function

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains the output of a classifier
input_tables.description: The relation that contains the output of a classifier

argument_clauses.name: ObsColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input column that contains the expected (correct) category.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input column that contains the expected (correct) category.

argument_clauses.name: PredictColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input column that contains the predicted category.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input column that contains the predicted category.

argument_clauses.name: SequenceInputBy
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the LIST_VECTOR of column(s) that uniquely identifies each row of the input argument INPUT_ARG_NAME. The argument is used to ensure deterministic results for functions which produce results that vary from run to run.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input column(s) that uniquely identify each row of input table. The format is 'input1:c1' where input1 refers to the alias used by the input table that contains such column named c1.
